item.description:
Hi Everyone,

After some back & forth negotiations with the Mountain View Resort I've finally come up with what I feel is a very reasonable price for a wonderful weekend get-away at one of the most beautiful hotels in New England. The Mountain View Grand is one of the few Grand Hotels remaining from an era when grandiose hotels were plentiful in NH & Maine tourist areas. Go to link below to view the Flyer for more information or to sign-up for this wonderful winter weekend in NH White Mountains. I have just 10 rooms reserved at the Mountain View Grand Hotel and this trip is sure to fill quickly so please don't delay in signing up if you'd like to go.


Winter Weekend Get-Away to Mountain View Grand Resort & Spa


Trip includes:

  • 2 nights lodging at Mountain View Grand Resort & Spa
  • 2 Full Breakfasts in Hotel Dining Room
  • Indoor amenities including pool, fitness area & theatre
  • Outdoor amenities including Cross Country ski rails & Ice Skating Rink



Price: $217 Per Person based on double room occupancy

NOTE: Your RSVP will be added after you sign-up for this trip
item.name: Winter Weekend Get-Away to Mountain View Grand Resort & Spa
